Author: meatspoon#7860
Content: I have a regulatory compliance question:  my understanding is that if coins/tokens are traded on an exchange (be it CEX or DEX) that could be considered securities, the SEC could possibly go after anyone who maintains that exchange or any gateways leading to the exchange.  Is there anyone on the KMD or BarterDex team that monitors coins traded on those exchanges?  Does KMD have legal council that is soliciting legal opinions from the coins that are traded on BarterDex?
